pet.name: Buddy
pet.description: Purebred with pedigree papers, excellent temperament. Buddy comes from champion bloodlines and has been socialized with people and other pets.

pet.name: Daisy
pet.description: Sweet and playful, great family dog. Daisy has a wonderful nose and loves to explore. She's perfect for active families.

pet.name: Milo
pet.description: Beautiful blue eyes, very affectionate. Milo is a traditional Siamese with striking markings and a loving personality.

pet.name: Snowball
pet.description: Fluffy and friendly, comes with cage. Snowball is litter-trained and enjoys fresh vegetables as treats.

pet.name: Rex
pet.description: Strong and loyal, from champion bloodline. Rex has an excellent pedigree and shows great potential as a family protector.

pet.name: Lola
pet.description: Sweet and gentle, perfect lap dog. Lola has a beautiful coat and loves to be pampered. Great for apartment living.

pet.name: Whiskers
pet.description: Large, gentle, and friendly. Whiskers has a luxurious coat and a calm personality, making him great with children.

pet.name: Bella
pet.description: Small, adorable, and gentle. Bella enjoys cuddles and is easy to handle, making her perfect for first-time rabbit owners.

pet.name: Max
pet.description: Highly intelligent and protective. Max is eager to learn and would excel in training or as a family guardian.

pet.name: Luna
pet.description: Elegant and calm, with a beautiful long coat. Luna loves a peaceful environment and is very affectionate with her family.

pet.name: Oliver
pet.description: Soft, velvety fur and a curious nature. Oliver is friendly and easy to litter-train, perfect for indoors.

pet.name: Charlie
pet.description: Friendly, energetic, and loyal. Charlie loves playing fetch and swimming, ideal for active families.
